name: Firewood
description: Firewood is a 2D adventure game with psychological horror elements. The game tells the story of an old man who has lost his wife years ago and is still having troubles with his past.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB or higher with Shader 3.0 support. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
